name: Beetle goes Home
description:
Beetle goes home. But do not lose your concentration - this task is not as simple as it looks. You will face the most fearsome opponents, there are: elusive time, curious spiders and predatory beetles. Will you? Then go!

Features:
  • Dozen of unforgettable adventures;
  • Time challenge;
  • Incredible insidious enemies;
  • Juicy purveyance. Apples for every taste;
  • Ingenious devices for survival;
  • Home, sweet home.
